CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: MOT brings box to center of room and sits down
CHI walks over and stands near MOT . CHI lifts one foot off the ground
CHI walks to MOT and looks into box
CHI looks at book then down at box cover
CHI smiles and slaps knee twice
CHI grabs box cover and hits it against the floor
CHI slaps floor with box cover again
there is something drawn on the cover
MOT points to book . MOT looks at CHI
CHI is rocking box cover back and forth across leg
CHI brushes hand against MOT's arm
CHI lifts foot up and then picks up box cover again
CHI begins brushing hand back and forth against box cover
CHI stops brushing back and forth on box cover
CHI resumes brushing hand back and forth on box cover
CHI stops brushing back and forth on box cover
CHI resumes brushing hand back and forth on box cover
MOT points to book and look at CHI
CHI claps hands together and looks at MOT . CHI smiles
CHI looks away from book and MOT
<bef> CHI looks back at book . CHI slaps hand against box cover once
CHI slaps hand against cover again
CHI leans in closer to book
MOT brushes hair back and points to book
CHI begins hitting hand against box cover
CHI picks up box cover again
CHI hits hand against box cover twice then moves cover back and forth against her legs
CHI lifts box cover up above head
CHI holds box behind her head
CHI glances at box behind her and looks back at book
MOT looks at CHI then back at book
CHI looks over at box cover which is behind her and then back at book
CHI begins picking up box cover and dropping it
CHI looks at box cover behind her
CHI lets go of box cover
CHI walks forward away from MOT
MOT puts book in box then stands up and closes box
CHI follows MOT over to table
MOT turns and shows puppet to CHI
MOT puts puppet on CHI's right hand
CHI examines puppet on her hand
MOT goes back to box and get other puppet
CHI watches MOT and moves her free hand up and down
<bef> MOT turns around to face CHI
MOT puts other puppet on her hand
CHI reaches free hand up to MOT
<bef> MOT walks to center of room and kneels down while opening and closing the mouth of her puppet
CHI reaches both arms out to MOT
MOT takes the puppet off her own hand
MOT holds puppet out to CHI
<bef> MOT places second puppet on CHI's left hand
MOT puts her hand on the Cookie_Monster puppet
CHI pulls her hand out of the Cookie_Monster puppet and then steps back
CHI glances at her puppet then looks back at MOT
MOT puts on the Cookie_Monster puppet
CHI looks at her own puppet and then back at MOT
MOT is about to imitate Cookie_Monster but stops
puppet is not all the way on
CHI brings hands together and then holds up the puppet again
MOT smiles and shakes her head no and she lowers the puppet momentarily .
CHI lowers her puppet and watches MOT
MOT raises up the puppet again .
MOT puts a pretend cookie in the puppet's mouth
MOT opens and closes the puppet's mouth to mimic chewing
MOT points to eyes of puppet
CHI takes off her puppet and jumps up and down
CHI looks down at her puppet
MOT turns puppet to face CHI
CHI lifts her puppet up and dances for a moment
CHI watches MOT and rocks her head back and forth once
CHI takes a step back and then a step forward
<bef> CHI walks back and forth in front of MOT
MOT looks at her own puppet
CHI lifts puppet up and holds it out away from MOT
CHI looks at her own puppet
MOT looks at CHI's puppet and brushes its fur
CHI holds out her puppet in MOT's direction
MOT nods then glances down at her own puppet
CHI looks at MOT and waves puppet back and forth
CHI takes puppet off her hand
MOT nods and looks down at her puppet
CHI turns around and looks around room
MOT looks at CHI then back down at her puppet
CHI climbs onto chair in corner of room
<bef> CHI turns and looks at MOT
MOT stands up and takes the puppet off and then goes to the table
CHI walks back to center of room and sits
MOT brings box to center of room and sits
CHI looks into box then up at MOT
MOT picks up piece of paper then sets it down
MOT picks up a third crayon
MOT displays three crayons to CHI
MOT looks at CHI and smiles
MOT searches through pieces of paper . <aft> MOT looks at CHI
MOT puts down other crayons and offers red crayon to CHI
CHI looks at crayons and paper
MOT puts piece of paper down in front of CHI
CHI scoots back a little bit
MOT points to paper in box then to paper on floor and then looks at CHI
CHI reaches into box and takes a piece of paper from under the top piece
CHI puts piece of paper on floor
<bef> MOT moves box back from drawing area
MOT points to paper in front of her
CHI looks at MOT's paper then over at door
sound of door slamming in background
CHI moves over and sits in front of her piece of paper
CHI hold crayon over paper for a moment
<bef> MOT sits up straight in front of her paper
MOT looks at CHI and nods
CHI looks back at her paper
MOT smiles and looks down at her paper
CHI looks back down at paper
CHI stops drawing for a moment , then begins again
<aft> MOT turns her drawing around to show CHI
<aft> MOT smiles and looks at CHI
CHI stands up and walks to MOT . <aft> CHI gives her drawing to MOT
MOT takes CHI's drawing and places it on floor between them
<aft> CHI looks at drawing on floor
CHI kneels down in front of drawing putting her hand on the drawing
CHI draws several long lines on page
CHI leans back and looks at work and then looks at MOT
MOT looks at her own drawing
CHI leans back and looks at work and then looks at MOT
CHI tosses two crayons onto drawing
MOT leans over and draws a smile on CHI's drawing
CHI points to drawing then looks at MOT
CHI moves back farther away from drawing
MOT holds crayon out to CHI
MOT looks at drawing . <$=5> MOT points to drawing
CHI leans forward and points out two locations on drawing
MOT holds crayon out to CHI
MOT glances down at drawing then looks at CHI
<bef> CHI glances to her left . CHI points to drawing . <aft> CHI glances to her right
MOT leans over and begins drawing
CHI watches drawing and rocks back and forth
MOT leans over and begins drawing
CHI moves finger in circle around page
CHI rocks forward and back once and watches drawing
CHI moves forward while watching drawing
CHI leans forward and looks closely at drawing
MOT leans back and looks at CHI . MOT smiles
CHI looks at MOT then down at other piece of paper
End of PCI - Paper and Crayons
MOT picks up paper and crayons and puts them in the box .
CHI leans over on her elbow but slips and falls on floor . <aft> CHI sits up rubbing elbow
MOT brings house over to center of room and places it on floor in front of CHI
CHI leans forward and takes a car from the house
MOT stretches out next ot house and watches CHI
CHI puts car in one of the upstairs rooms
CHI looks at MOT then back at house
noise of toys in house obscure CHI's words
CHI closes and then opens the house and reaches inside
MOT opens the house a little farther .
MOT nods and looks back at house
MOT takes a figure from the house and puts it on the floor
<bef> MOT reaches into house and moves a toy bed
<aft> CHI leans back and looks at house
<bef> MOT opens house a little farther
CHI begins playing with objects again
MOT looks at CHI then back at house
CHI positions toys in house . CHI pulls one figure out and repositions it and then puts it back in
<aft> CHI leans back and looks at house
CHI glances at MOT then looks at house
CHI moves back away from house a bit
MOT glances at CHI then looks back to house
<bef> CHI leans forward and moves toy inside house and then leans back
MOT looks at house . <aft> MOT looks at CHI
CHI picks up figure from house
<bef> CHI begins to reach into house but stops
CHI picks up figure from house
CHI leans back and looks at house
MOT pretends to give soup to two of the figures
CHI puts hand on roof of house
CHI positions figures inside house and takes one figure out
MOT places a figure on the floor in front of the house
MOT reaches for one of the figures CHI is holding
MOT looks at the figure CHI is holding in her left hand
CHI pulls hand away from MOT's hand
CHI puts a different figure into the house
MOT points to figure in CHI's left hand and looks at CHI
CHI looks at MOT then down at figure in her hand
MOT smiles . <aft> MOT looks at house
CHI positions figures in front of house
MOT pretends to give dinner to the figures
CHI repositions some of the figures
MOT repositions some of the figures .
End of PCI - House . INV enters the room .
